file_content.text: Welcome back. Go about your business.
Why are you bothering me? I thought you were done here.
Finally some peace and quiet.
I've captured Reneget Vause. Get your boss on the line.
And I thought Trandos looked hideous out of carbonite.
Sir, your bounty hunter has just delivered Reneget Vause into my custody.
You've renewed my faith in your profession, bounty hunter. I'll be wiring a substantial sum to an account of your choosing.
Send it to this account. It's been a pleasure.
Glad to be of service.
Likewise. I'll know who to contact if I have need of a capable hunter.
I never get tired of hearing that.
I love my job.
I imagine not.
Be sure to tell everyone that.
You've built yourself a reputation, even among the Chiss.
I've got a body for you to take off my hands.
That is one ugly creature... what'd you kill him with? A garbage masher?
Sir, your bounty hunter has returned with a Trandoshan corpse. What's left of it matches Reneget Vause's description.
Hmm, I see he could not be taken alive.
Still, Vause dead is better than another failure. You will be paid in full.
That's very kind of you, Aristocra.
Thank you.
Stopping Vause was obviously no easy task.
This is the way it had to be.
Glad you decided not to make a fuss about it.
You took that well.
The important thing is that Vause can cause no more trouble for the Ascendancy.
That concludes our business, if there is nothing else?
I think that about covers it.
Yes, that's everything.
Not unless you got another job.
Got anymore work?
Hey! What about Blizz? Blizz help too! What blue-man give Blizz?
Khel, why is this creature listening in on my communications?
Sir, I--I... this is the last straw, you little rat. I'm grabbing a shock collar.
If I learned anything on Tatooine, it's that seeing a Jawa get electrocuted is hilarious. Stick around for the show?
Lay a finger on him, and you'll be wearing your guts on the outside.
Shut up, Gault. We're helping.
This--this creature is a prisoner of the Chiss Ascendancy. You have no rights here!
Yeah, I'll take a rain check.
Tempting, but no.
Pick on someone your own size.
Embarrassing me in front of an employer is the quick road to a body bag, got it?
You're out of line, kid.
You're not gonna let them do that, are you?
Blizz help and get punished! Blizz always getting punished. Not fair! New friend tell blue-men Blizz help.
Back off. The Jawa's coming with me, understand?
I'm getting you out of here.
What're you gonna do with your prisoner now?
What happens to Blizz?
When there is no longer any use for it, it'll be executed for its crimes against the Ascendancy.
And I thought working for you was a thankless job.
Better keep useful or you'll be in the same position.
It is. We're going.
He's harmless, just let him go.
It's not our business, Torian.
Stay out of this.
Nobody asked your opinion, Torian. Shut it.
You're out of line, kid.
You can't let them kill Blizz! We might never have gotten Vause if it weren't for him.
It's not our decision, Mako.
He's their prisoner.
He played his part. I'm done with him.
I don't care about a Jawa.
Blizz thought we team. Be friends! New friend really leave Blizz in cage?
What'll it take to get Blizz out of this cell?
Will you let the Jawa go?
The creature is responsible for damage done to Chiss territory.
No fair! Blizz help too! Why everyone Blizz help want to kill Blizz? New friend not want to kill Blizz, right?
Blizz has been useful to me. I'd like to take him off your hands.
I want to take Blizz with me.
It's okay, Blizz. I'll help.
This alien is a prisoner of the Chiss Ascendancy. He's not going anywhere.
The White Maw's in shambles. You don't need to keep Blizz locked up.
Why bother keeping a prisoner?
The alien was a member of an organization that has caused a lot of damage to Chiss sovereign territory.
Enough, Khel. The creature's crimes are hardly exceptional, and its worth is questionable.
If you agree to a reduction of your pay, I'll release it to your custody.
I accept the terms. Turn him over.
Deal.
If it weren't for his help, you wouldn't have Vause right now--that not enough?
He's earned a pardon.
A fair point.
Khel, release the creature and see that it is delivered to the bounty hunter's ship.
Yes, sir.
Again, a pleasure dealing with you. Consider yourself a guest of the Ascendancy while on Hoth.
You need something? No? Move along then, please.
I'm here to interrogate your prisoner.
This can't be authentic. Wait here. I mean it.
You will, ahem, please excuse my manners before.
The prisoner is right this way. Little rat has been nothing but trouble.
What do you mean?
Trouble how?
It's slipped out of its cell six times since the patrols brought it in. Don't ask me how. Never makes a run for it, though.
Just noses around and starts taking things apart. It's driving me crazy.
I don't need a running commentary.
Stop your complaining.
Its tune'll change in a minute.
I'll scare it straight.
You think so, tough girl? I wouldn't count on it.
You think so, tough guy? I wouldn't count on it.
Ooh, space armor! Good color, you paint? Many lights... and fly-box! Zoom! Yes? It have flame-maker too?
You know, I really thought the galaxy'd run out of ways to surprise me by now.
Think all the White Maw will be this threatening?
Aww, he's precious. Can we keep him?
Good luck understanding it. Show yourself out when you're finished.
This nice blaster. You have big hands. How you hold this?
Give it back and I'll show you.
I'd like that back.
Okay, here you go.
Whoa, watch where you point that thing.
Hey, that's dangerous.
Oh? Sorry, sorry.
Hand it over, or you'll become well-acquainted with my "flame-maker."
Keep your hands off my stuff.
Aww....
Tell me what you know about Reneget Vause, the Trandoshan.
I need information from you.
Boss Vause? Boss Vause kinda crazy. Always go find harm out in white sand with no cold-clothes.
One time, drag himself back to camp, feet like ice, arm chewed off, fistful of wampa pelts in teeth!
What's your name, buddy?
So, who are you?
Blizz friends call him Blizz. Not real name, but Blizz like it.
Aren't you a little far from home?
What's a Jawa doing on Hoth?
Uh-huh. Home small and boring! All old sand, older junk. Blizz join band to work on space crawler for friend Slam.
Blizz never see friends again now.... Stupid Jreely Toomb. Tell foreman Blizz steal tech and hide things under cot.
Boss Vause drag Blizz along on hunt in cold white sand, sic crew on Blizz like pack of womp rats. Can't go back now.
Where's the last place you saw them?
Where can I find Vause?
Blizz been here little while now. Make good guess though.
Vause hung you out to dry. So why not help me toss him in a cage?
How about a little payback?
Yes! Blizz happy to help!
Help me find Vause and maybe I can get you sprung.
You help me, I'll help you.
Blizz like it if blue-men stop putting Blizz in cage. Blizz do his best!
Try hunting camp boss Vause drag Blizz to. Down in big ice cave. It not far. Maybe he still there?
Boss Vause always fighting and killing. Scary, scary. You not have to chase him. Be careful!
This is a restricted area. Get out of here before I order the droids to fill you with holes.
He ain't worth that much to me.
Forget it, he's on his own.
I'm not your pal.
If the Ascendancy has any further need of me, you have my frequency.
I'm done here.
I don't care if you live.
Mean person not friend of Blizz. Just use Blizz. Everyone just use Blizz....
Khel, see that the creature does not tamper with anything further.
Good day, bounty hunter. Consider yourself a guest of the Ascendancy while on Hoth.
This is it.
He doesn't deserve that.
You better be worth it.
Blizz give big thanks! Blizz be big help to new friend, Blizz promise!
